components.description:
A fly with a dark or iridescent green body, six legs, and two translucent wings. On most platforms, its eyes are red.

Can be used to talk about the insect or flight in general. May also be used metaphorically as an adjective meaning "cool."
components.title: Fly

version.description:
Unicode 13.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on March 10, 2020. 55 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 117 new emojis for 2020 (including sequences for gender and skin tone) listed under Emoji 13.0.

  • ðŸ”£ Unicode 13.0.0 Specification

More about what's new in Unicode 13.0.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's fly emoji depicts a common housefly rendered with a metallic sheen and detailed wing texture, showcasing Apple's commitment to realistic lighting and glossy 3D shading. The small, dark body and transparent wings are meticulously crafted with soft, rounded edges, giving it a surprisingly detailed yet universally recognizable form. On Apple devices, this emoji often conveys annoyance, a sense of something being bothersome, or can be used humorously to represent something small and irritating.
